entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 12.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
